participant_1.background:
I'm single and enjoy my freedom to drive around with the wind in my hair.
I have a pet dog that helps me cope with my emotions.
I love the freedom of riding my motorcycle, and I look forward to one day taking my kids on rides with me.
i like eating pretzels.
None of my family members work in the medical field.

participant_2.background:
I tripped and fell into a hole while hiking and broke my leg.
I treasure my record collection, it's a physical manifestation of my passion for music.
i am married with kids.
i love to cook.
I only speak one language, but I love watching action movies with my family on Netflix.

content.text: Hey there! What's your favorite way to relax?
I love to cook, it's very therapeutic for me. I also like to watch action movies with my family on Netflix.
That sounds great! I'm single and I enjoy my freedom to drive around with the wind in my hair. I also like to eat pretzels.
You sound fun! I love pretzels too. I tripped and fell into a hole while hiking and broke my leg, so I don't get to do much outdoor activity anymore.
Oh no! I'm so sorry to hear that. I hope you're doing better now.
Thank you! I'm doing much better. I'm married with kids, and we all love to cook. We have a large record collection that we treasure, it's a physical manifestation of our passion for music.
That's great! I'm glad to hear that you're doing well. Do you have any pets?
Yes, I have a dog. He's a great companion and helps me cope with my emotions.
That's great! I love dogs. I'm looking forward to one day taking my kids on motorcycle rides with me.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I hope you enjoy it.
